about_the_game:
Isle Frontier is an isometric point-and-click life simulator where you can build a homestead on your own personal island. Live on your own by utilizing your vast array of skills, such as fishing, hunting, cooking, crafting, and more.

This game is focused primarily on a casual and relaxing experience, and as such has less emphasis on survival. A perfect game for those looking for something less stressful than most life sims!

Features

  • Point-and-click: Isle Frontier relies almost entirely on mouse input, with minimum keyboard input required.

  • Character customization: Change the appearance of your character at the beginning of the game, and at anytime by using a vanity. Clothes can also be changed at dressers!

  • Home design: Customize your house by changing the floor layout and building furniture such as beds, chairs, and tables, which can be painted any color you desire.

Skills

As you use your various skills, you will gain experience and eventually increase your skill level, which will unlock more features and content. Chop down tougher trees by increasing your logging level, assemble more complex furniture by increasing your building level, etc.

  • Building: Upgrade your home and construct pieces of furniture.

  • Compounding: Concoct elixirs that can improve your abilities.

  • Cooking: Prepare meals that can increase your energy.

  • Crafting: Create tools and items from natural resources.

  • Farming: Grow crops that can be cooked and compounded.

  • Firemaking: Light fires in order to cook meals.

  • Fishing: Catch fish that can be cooked.

  • Hunting: Kill prey that can be cooked.

  • Logging: Chop trees down for wood.

  • Mining: Extract minerals from deposits.

  • Smelting: Create metal bars and other materials from ores.

  • Tapping: Extract sap from trees that can be compounded.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600, AMD FX-9370
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 730, AMD Radeon 520
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 128 MB available space

short_description: Make a life of your own in this isometric point-and-click life simulator. Level up your skills by fishing, hunting, cooking, crafting, and much more. The island has everything you need to not only survive, but thrive!
